Package fi.tuni.tamk.tiko

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoreGameplayLoop
    This is the core loop of the game, where the player can play the game
    Main
    A single player card game where a player answers yes or no to a question and tries to balance different stats.
    MainMenu
    Main menu includes buttons to start game, go to settings menu and to quit the game
    SettingsMenu
    Settings menu that includes options to turn on/off music and sfx also has a button to return to main menu
